channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 3 Easy Ways To Show Genuine Love To Your Partner, By A Psychologist
item.description: The early sparks may fade, but your efforts don’t have to. Making your partner feel loved is an intentional choice, not something reserved only for th...

item.title: The Federal Tax Credit May Be History, But Big-Time EV Incentives Remain Plentiful
item.description: Deals as rich as $11,000 cash back should help lure buyers into showrooms without the one-time tax credit.

item.title: From Vulnerability Fatigue To Autonomous Remediation
item.description: Automation and AI are changing DevSecOps, moving teams beyond alert fatigue to proactive, autonomous remediation at enterprise scale.

item.title: Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs Sentenced To 4 Years In Prison
item.description: Prosecutors were pushing for 11 years, while Diddy’s lawyers wanted him to be released by the end of the year.

item.title: Meet The Woman Who’s Making Shark Science Inclusive And Revolutionary
item.description: From bull shark nurseries in North Carolina to the hidden impacts of shark tourism in Florida, one scientist’s unconventional path is reshaping how we...

item.title: Two kinds of confrontations
item.description: When we win by having someone else lose, we set up a conflict. It’s clear, direct but not generative. But when we win by confronting our fear, everyon...

item.title: Reciprocity
item.description: Our biggest commitments, the things we are most dedicated to, rarely pay us back in equal measure. That might be the point.

item.title: Recalculating the cost of convenience

item.title: “Because I said so”

item.title: Acceleration is felt, velocity is ignored
